casebody.data:
PENNYMAC HOLDINGS, LLC, f/k/a PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust Holdings I, Appellant,
v.
FIDELITY NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY; and Fidelity National Title Agency of Nevada, Inc., Respondents. No. 72538 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 30, 2018

AFFIRMED IN PART. REVERSED IN PART. REMAND.
